siteMetadata.title: A11yTalks
siteMetadata.subtitle: Virtual monthly meet-up group that features speakers & conversations around the topic of digital accessibility.

frontmatter.title: Digital Communication in the Age of COVID-19
frontmatter.subtitle: Imelda March
frontmatter.description: It seems that everyone has a message or opinion to share in the age of COVID-19. The question then is whether that message can be heard by everyone. Is your digital message accessible?
